bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of vexation and pressure felt in the region of the heart and chest and being caused by extravascular blood or blood stagnation. Xin xiu ben cao 新修本草 Substance Entry zhe shang mu 折傷 木：主傷折筋骨疼痛，散血補血，產後血悶 , “It controls pain in harmed and broken sinews and bones; it disperses blood, and it supplements blood. [It cures] blood heart-pressure following delivery”.
